items.content_html: Real-time Weather Data: Fetches up-to-date weather details using the OpenWeather API. Simple and Intuitive UI: Easy to use — just input the city or country name, and get instant results. Fast and Lightweight: Optimized for performance, making it quick to load and use.
items.title: NimishaRawat/weather-app: Real-time Weather Data: Fetches up-to-date weather details using the OpenWeather API. Simple and Intuitive UI: Easy to use — just input the city or country name, and get instant results. Fast and Lightweight: Optimized for performance, making it quick to load and use.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
